section.p: The token used in the Request sample below is the token returned when API login authentication is passed.

section.title: Request Parameters
section.p: No request parameters. Only need to send the request address.

section.title: Examples

p.codeblock: POST /api/v1.1.0/logout?token=277ac400357b509b4a587ff2157f7ad5 HTTP/1.1 Content-Type:application/json; charset=utf-8 Host: 192.168.5.150Host: api.yeastarcloud.com
